name: ead-rio
description: EAD Rio child theme for Hello Elementor

scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:prod && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:dev: npm run prebuild && npm run build:ts:dev && npm run build:css:dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:ts && npm run build:css
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run deps:check
scripts.postbuild: npm run fix:imports && npm run build:validate
scripts.build:validate: test -f dist/js/src/theme.js && test -f dist/css/style.css && echo 'Build validation passed'
scripts.dev: npm run dev:check && concurrently "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:css" "browser-sync start --config bs-config.js"
scripts.dev:check: command -v ddev >/dev/null 2>&1 && ddev describe >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'DDEV is not running. Please start with: ddev start' && exit 1)
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:ts -- --fix && npm run lint:css -- --fix
scripts.clean:unused: echo 'Scanning for unused files...' && find src -name '*.ts' -type f ! -path '*/node_modules/*' | head -10
scripts.deps:check: command -v sass >/dev/null 2>&1 && command -v tsc >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Missing dependencies. Run: npm install' && exit 1)
scripts.theme:validate: test -f style.css && test -f functions.php && test -f index.php && echo 'WordPress theme validation passed'

author: EAD Rio
